entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
